item.title: 10K Declares Failure, Airdrops Over $2.30M to Presale ParticipantsWatch-to-earn project 10kdotworld announced its failure due to issues such as presale pressure, bot farming, and creator access. The project team used the WATCHCOIN treasury, originally intended for rewards, to airdrop over $2.30M worth of WATCHCOIN tokens to users who participated in the presale. [Foresight News]

item.title: Bitget Wallet Launches $50,000 KOKOK Trading Event to Support Solana Meme Ecosystem DevelopmentAccording to official news, Bitget Wallet launched a KOKOK trading event with a total prize pool of $50,000.00 from July 22nd to July 29th. Rewards will be distributed based on the user's total KOKOK trading volume. The higher the trading volume, the more rewards will be received. The top 10 traders will also share an exclusive prize pool. Participants can also get additional lottery tickets for the weekly FOMO Thursdays staking event. KOKOK is one of the fastest-growing meme coins in the Solana ecosystem recently. According to on-chain data, the total market value of Solana meme coins has exceeded $14.00B, and daily protocol fees on platforms such as Bonk.fun exceed $1.00M. [Techflow]

item.title: WEEX Exchange Launches New "Spot Pro" System, Further Improving Performance and ExperienceOn July 23, according to an announcement by WEEX Exchange, in order to continuously optimize the trading experience, WEEX launched a new "Spot Pro" system, completely replacing the old spot system. The new system performance reaches 20,000 TPS, and the matching efficiency is greatly improved; placing and canceling orders is smoother, and data is pushed more timely; slippage is smaller, and the transaction price is better; it will support 3,000+ currency pairs, and the liquidity is stronger; the fund account is separated from the trading account, and asset management is clearer. WEEX reminds users to update the App version as soon as possible, and transfer the assets of the original "Spot" account to the "Spot Pro" account with one click. Before 17:59 on July 27, users who meet the conditions can receive 1 - 5 U contract experience funds after completing the transfer, and enjoy 0 transaction fees for all currencies in "Spot Pro". After that, the system will automatically transfer, and the old "Spot" system will be offline on August 1. [Techflow]

item.title: UK to ban public sector from making ransomware paymentsThe UK will prohibit its public sector, such as its health service and local councils, from paying ransomware in a bid to “smash the cyber criminal business model.”

item.title: GLG hacker deposits ~$746,000.00 into Tornado CashCertiK's Alert System detected approximately 140.7 BNB (approximately $746,000.00 USD) being deposited into Tornado Cash, with these funds being related to the GLG hack that occurred on July 21st. The hacker minted 8.50M tokens from the Mint contract and sold them for 745,000.00 BSC-USD. [Foresight News]

item.title: DDC Enterprise plans to increase its Bitcoin holdings to 10,000 by the end of this yearOn July 23, according to Businesswire, Norma Chu, founder, chairman, and CEO of DDC Enterprise, a NYSE-listed company, published a shareholder letter, which pointed out that it received a $528.00 million transformation capital commitment earlier this month. So far, investors such as Anson Funds, Animoca Brands, and Kenetic Capital have provided about $53.00 million in initial financing funds. It has now submitted a general F-3 shelved registration statement to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. The shelved registration will allow it to conduct a rights issue of up to $500.00 million to support its Bitcoin expansion strategy. In addition, the company also announced a new Bitcoin increase plan: it plans to increase its Bitcoin holdings to 10,000 by the end of 2025, and become one of the top three listed companies using a Bitcoin reserve strategy within three years. [PANews]

Hotcoin Exchange is about to launch DNUT, YALA, and COA spot tradingOn July 23, according to official news, Hotcoin Exchange will launch the following trading pairs on July 23:
Spot trading pairs
DNUT/USDT (July 23, 12:00 UTC+8): The DNUT token is a meme coin on the Solana blockchain.
YALA/USDT (July 23, 12:00 UTC+8): $YALA is the native token of the Yala project. Yala enables BTC holders to earn yield and move liquidity between ecosystems, blockchains, and protocols.
COA/USDT (July 23, 18:20 UTC+8): $COA is the native token of the Alliance Games project. Alliance Games is a decentralized infrastructure platform built specifically for game development and hosting. [Techflow]

item.title: Japanese media: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to announce his resignation at the end of AugustAccording to Japan's Mainichi Shimbun, Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba has indicated to those around him that he will announce his intention to resign no later than August, based on the results of the House of Councillors election compiled by the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) in August. It is reported that Ishiba plans to hold talks with LDP Chief Advisor Taro Aso, LDP Vice President Yoshihide Suga, and former Prime Minister Fumio Kishida on the same day to discuss his personal future. Ishiba immediately expressed his intention to stay in office after the crushing defeat in the House of Councillors election, but he is currently facing growing calls for his resignation and criticism within the party, and the timing of his final decision may still change. In addition to local organizations across the country demanding the Prime Minister's resignation and reform of the party structure, veteran and young lawmakers have also proposed convening a "General Meeting of Members of Both Houses," a decision-making body second only to the party convention, to demand an early election vote. [Foresight News]

He then opened an ant position of 2x PENGU short position, worth $520,000, with a current floating loss of $100,000. [PANews]

item.title: Eddie Yue: Avoid over-hyping stablecoins; only a few stablecoin licenses will be issued in the initial phase.According to Jinshi, Eddie Yue, Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Monetary Authority, spoke again about stablecoins, saying that with the recent hype surrounding the concept of stablecoins, the market has seen excessive excitement. Some listed companies, regardless of whether their main business is related to stablecoins or digital assets, have seen their share prices rise and stock trading volume increase significantly as soon as they announce their intention to develop stablecoin business, which is like turning stone into gold, and the company's visibility has also been greatly improved. In fact, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority has made it clear earlier that it will only issue a few stablecoin licenses at most in the initial stage, which means that there will be many disappointed parties. Even if a license is obtained, based on our desire for steady development, coupled with the resources required in the initial stage, the contribution to the company's short-term profits will be uncertain to a certain extent. We hope that investors will remain calm when digesting the market's "positive" news. [Foresight News]

item.title: Shanghai Data Exchange held a closed-door seminar on "New Opportunities in the Capital Market: RDA" to discuss topics such as RWA.On July 23, according to the WeChat public account of Shanghai Data Exchange, as introduced by Jinshi, on July 21, Shanghai Data Exchange held a closed-door seminar on "New Opportunities in the Capital Market: RDA". More than ten financial institutions including Cathay Haitong Securities, CITIC Construction Investment Securities, CICC, Orient Securities, Ping An Securities, Huaxin Securities, Shanxi Securities, Zheshang Securities, Tianfeng Asset Management, Huatai Asset Management, and Debang Asset Management attended the seminar to discuss key topics such as data value, RWA and RDA. Shanghai Data Exchange proposed the new RDA paradigm for the first time, emphasizing the anchoring of real-number integrated physical assets, and the role of data in authenticity verification and value enhancement of other physical assets. On the one hand, RDA can help accelerate the process of marketization and value of data elements, and on the other hand, it can promote the coordinated development of data elements and other elements, improve the docking efficiency of physical assets and capital, promote the development of new quality productivity, and promote the implementation of the deep integration system of the real economy and the digital economy. [PANews]

item.title: Hut 8 Subsidiary Obtains Dubai International Financial Centre LicenseBitcoin mining firm Hut 8 Corp. has announced that its subsidiary, Hut 8 Investment Ltd, has obtained a commercial license from the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC). The license authorizes it to conduct proprietary investments and certain non-financial commercial activities within the DIFC's legal and regulatory framework based on international standards and common law principles. [Foresight News]

MEI has appointed Litecoin founder and PIPE lead investor Charlie Lee to its board of directors and GSR as its digital asset and treasury management advisor to oversee the implementation of its Litecoin strategic reserve.
